body_html: If you use persistent tensors directly or have "operator batching" in your immediate mode, you could reduce significantly the number of run calls, and hence eliminate a lot of those 200 usec overheads.
body_text: If you use persistent tensors directly or have "operator batching" in your immediate mode, you could reduce significantly the number of run calls, and hence eliminate a lot of those 200 usec overheads.
body: If you use persistent tensors directly or have "operator batching" in your immediate mode, you could reduce significantly the number of run calls, and hence eliminate a lot of those 200 usec overheads.
